consent.title: Informed Consent
consent.description: Please read and agree to participate in this study.

warmup.title: Your Health Today
warmup.description: Please indicate which statements best describe your own health today.

mobility.title: Mobility
mobility.level1: I have no problems in walking about
mobility.level2: I have slight problems in walking about
mobility.level3: I have moderate problems in walking about
mobility.level4: I have severe problems in walking about
mobility.level5: I am unable to walk about

selfCare.title: Self-Care
selfCare.level1: I have no problems washing or dressing myself
selfCare.level2: I have slight problems washing or dressing myself
selfCare.level3: I have moderate problems washing or dressing myself
selfCare.level4: I have severe problems washing or dressing myself
selfCare.level5: I am unable to wash or dress myself

usualActivities.title: Usual Activities
usualActivities.subtitle: (e.g. work, study, housework, family or leisure activities)
usualActivities.level1: I have no problems doing my usual activities
usualActivities.level2: I have slight problems doing my usual activities
usualActivities.level3: I have moderate problems doing my usual activities
usualActivities.level4: I have severe problems doing my usual activities
usualActivities.level5: I am unable to do my usual activities

painDiscomfort.title: Pain / Discomfort
painDiscomfort.level1: I have no pain or discomfort
painDiscomfort.level2: I have slight pain or discomfort
painDiscomfort.level3: I have moderate pain or discomfort
painDiscomfort.level4: I have severe pain or discomfort
painDiscomfort.level5: I have extreme pain or discomfort

anxietyDepression.title: Anxiety / Depression
anxietyDepression.level1: I am not anxious or depressed
anxietyDepression.level2: I am slightly anxious or depressed
anxietyDepression.level3: I am moderately anxious or depressed
anxietyDepression.level4: I am severely anxious or depressed
anxietyDepression.level5: I am extremely anxious or depressed

vas.title: How good or bad is your health TODAY?
vas.description: On a scale from 0 (worst health you can imagine) to 100 (best health you can imagine)

practice.title: Practice Task
practice.description: Let's practice with an example before the main tasks.

tto.title: Time Trade-Off Task
tto.instructions: Move the slider to find the point where you would be indifferent between Life A and Life B.
tto.worseThanDeath: This state may be considered worse than death

feedback.title: Review Your Responses
feedback.description: Please review your responses. Flag any that you'd like to reconsider.

dce.title: Discrete Choice Experiment
dce.choosePreferred: Which health state would you prefer?

complete.title: Interview Complete
complete.description: Thank you for completing the interview.

copilot.title: AI Interview Co-pilot
copilot.error: Failed to get response. Please try again.

hero.title: EQ-5D-5L Time Trade-Off Survey
hero.subtitle: Professional digital platform for health state valuation research

tto.title: Interactive TTO Tasks
tto.description: Visual decision aids for accurate health state valuation

multilingual.title: Multi-Language Support
multilingual.description: Available in English, Spanish, Chinese, Indonesian, and Malay

ai.title: AI Interview Co-pilot
ai.description: Real-time protocol guidance and data quality monitoring

export.title: Data Export
export.description: Download session data in CSV or JSON format
